com.aws

Class AWSManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aws.AWSManager

  • public class AWSManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps us manage connections to AWS services

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AWSManager() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 configureS3() 
      java.util.ArrayList<SortObject> getAllFiles(int clientId)
      This method gets all the files from S3 and sorts the files according to their size.These files are then partitioned based on the number of slave nodes.File in each partition is then read and then the concerned value (temperature here) is put in an ArrayList.
      void mapAllFiles(int clientId, Mapper mapper)
      Mapper method to fetch all files
      java.lang.String readFilesfromS3andConcat(int clientId)
      This method reads files from S3 output bucket, and merges the contents of the files from different slave nodes.
      void reduceKey(int clientNum, Reducer reducer)
      Reducer method that performs the reduce operation on sorted output
      void sendFileToS3(java.lang.String uploadFileName, java.lang.String ec2FileName)
      This method uploads a file and an ec2 file (with the partitions information) to the S3 output.

    • Method Detail

      • configureS3

        public com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 configureS3()

      • getAllFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<SortObject> getAllFiles(int clientId)
        This method gets all the files from S3 and sorts the files according to their size.These files are then partitioned based on the number of slave nodes.File in each partition is then read and then the concerned value (temperature here) is put in an ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        clientId -
        Returns:

      • sendFileToS3

        public void sendFileToS3(java.lang.String uploadFileName,
                java.lang.String ec2FileName)
        This method uploads a file and an ec2 file (with the partitions information) to the S3 output. The method tries uploading the file to s3 till it reaches a maximum count.
        Parameters:
        uploadFileName -
        ec2FileName -

      • readFilesfromS3andConcat

        public java.lang.String readFilesfromS3andConcat(int clientId)
                                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        This method reads files from S3 output bucket, and merges the contents of the files from different slave nodes.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
